channel.title: Help with theiving :)
channel.description: What would be the best way to give the people who play on my server 20 thieving. I've tried a command but I couldn't get it so they could only use it once. Could I make it so that they start with 20 thieving? The reason I want this is because you need at least 20 to thieve from the stalls and It takes a while to get 20 thieving. Any help would be appreciated. :rolleyes:

item.title: Help with theiving :)
item.dc:creator: @T33J4Y T33J4Y
item.description:
@T33J4Y wrote:

[quote=“poopy1234, post:4, topic:286793”]well ok this is silk stall

if(objectID == 2560){ TheifStall("silk stall", "and recieve 100k", 1, 300*playerLevel[17], 995, 100000, 0x340);
ok the object id for silk stall is 2560,

300*playlevel[17]

300 is the theiving exp, and the 17 is the id for the skill theving

995, 100000

995 is coins code, and 100000 is the amount of coins.
good luck ;D
If you need object list just search zodiac.[/quote]
Well, that isn’t really helpful. I need to know how to lower the thieving level that you need to thieve from a stall.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with theiving :)
item.dc:creator: @T33J4Y T33J4Y
item.description:
@T33J4Y wrote:

poopy1234:

try using a cake stall, and changing the lvl needed for it to 1. and add like 5k or something

How do you change the level needed to use the stall? I was wondering if there was a way to do that.

Read full topic
